user.title: FranklinWH Setup
user.description: Connect your FranklinWH energy storage system to Home Assistant. Note: Local API is currently not functional - only cloud polling is available.

data_description.gateway_id: Find your Gateway ID in the FranklinWH app under More → Site Address → SN. This is the complete serial number (usually starts with 100).

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate FranklinWH
reauth_confirm.description: The credentials for your FranklinWH account need to be updated.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to FranklinWH. Gateway may be offline or unreachable. Please verify: 1) Gateway is powered on, 2) Gateway ID is correct, 3) Network connection is working.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials.
error.invalid_gateway: Invalid Gateway ID. Please check your Gateway ID in the FranklinWH app under More → Site Address → SN.
error.timeout: Gateway device timeout. Please verify the gateway is online and connected to the network.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This FranklinWH gateway is already configured.

init.title: FranklinWH Options
init.description: Configure polling interval for your FranklinWH integration. Local API options are disabled as they are not yet functional.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll for updates from the cloud (minimum 30 seconds, default 60 seconds)

set_operation_mode.name: Set Operation Mode
set_operation_mode.description: Set the operation mode of the FranklinWH system.

set_battery_reserve.name: Set Battery Reserve
set_battery_reserve.description: Set the minimum battery reserve percentage.
